title: Help My LoL client is not installing the game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: My game got uninstalled and when I tried to install it again when it came to the part you install the game through the client this came up and its not installing the game what do i do:*(

replies.body: Oh no!  It looks like your client might be stuck trying to install, and that can happen if a security setting is blocking it from happening.  Run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get that up to date.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I tired everything and it's still not working what can I do?

Sorry to hear the issue is still going on, but I appreciate you trying!  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to obtain some logs and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
Go to C file and delete Riot Games folder. Then try to download again. Works for me
